name: ext_R5_Contract_te_offer
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Contract.term.offer for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version extension represents Contract.term.offer from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Contract|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R3.

element.definition: The matter of concern in the context of this provision of the agrement.
element.comment: `Contract.term.offer` has no related element in R3:Contract
